title: not sure if a bug
body:
is it supposed to work like this because with the wording it shouldn't be like this .... i was playing {{champion:17}}  ... i was up against {{champion:120}}  ... and after i blinded him he could still do damage with his e ... now if u read his e it says his next BASIC ATTACK has increased range and knocks back .... now based off this it still counts as a basic attack and should miss ... yes the knock back should still happen but it should do no damage ... duo to it still doing damage well he was blinded tho he was able to kill me when he shouldn't of been able to.

2 things:

1. i don't know where to post this i don't see any place to post bugs and what not

2. If this is meant to happen then please change the wording on his E because how it is worded right now it should miss

replies.body:
Hey there.

>While Hecarim is charging, his next basic attack gains bonus range, Airborne icon knocks back his target, and deals physical damage based on how far Hecarim traveled during Devastating Charge's duration

The actual basic attack will miss, however the effect of the knockback and additional damage will still occur from what I can gather.

looking at the damage on it ... it hit me for way more then it should of ... it was very early game ... we where like level 4 or w/e and it hit me for like 200-250 ... it shouldn't hit anywhere that close that early in game if its not getting damage from the auto / basic attack also

Level 4, it's possible he put all points into e first, max damage per level is as follows.

>MAXIMUM PHYSICAL DAMAGE: 80 / 150 / 220 / 290 / 360 (+ 100% bonus AD)

Depending on what items he had it's possible that it could've hit for that much at level 4.

Minimum Physical Damage: 40 / 75 / 110 / 145 / 180 (+ 50% bonus AD)

i looked up the scaling and its that ... and the most points u can have at 4 in a move is i think 3 ... it still shouldn't do as much as it did

That's the minimum damage, I listed the max damage. Depending on distance travelled the damage will vary.

However it seems that the bonus damage does not go through blind. Are you sure the blind was still active on him at the time of the charge hitting?

If you genuinely believe this is a bug you should consider posting a [bug report on the NA Boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report), please read [this](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/3mQGBEjA-how-to-report-a-game-bug) thread about how to post a good bug report before you make your thread.
i put my q on his as he was charging at me like half a sec before he hit me ... he should of been blinded because teemos blind last longer then like .5 seconds even at level 1
Well, then feel free to submit a bug report if you'd like.
i don't know where to submit a bug or i would of all ready
